tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vendor_reports ( 
 id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
 vendor_name VARCHAR(255), 
 expense DECIMAL, 
 cost_savings DECIMAL, 
 negotiation_outcome VARCHAR(50) 
);

CREATE TABLE vendor_expenses (
 vendor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 expense_date DATE,
 expense_amount DECIMAL,
 expense_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE cost_savings (
 saving_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 saving_date DATE,
 saving_amount DECIMAL,
 saving_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE negotiation_outcomes (
 outcome_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 negotiation_date DATE,
 vendor_id INT,
 outcome_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Expenses (
    expense_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id UUID REFERENCES Vendor(vendor_id),
    expense_amount DECIMAL,
    expense_date DATE,
    expense_description VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE CostSavings (
    saving_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id UUID REFERENCES Vendor(vendor_id),
    saving_amount DECIMAL,
    saving_date DATE,
    saving_description VARCHAR(255)
);
